posts.post_content: It's funny because the censorship only brings more attention to the word they are censoring. Anyway, 5 stars for a common that is marginally better than Tidings because the mana payment can be staggered, and it requires two counters to stop.

Posted By: Kryptnyt (2/21/2010 3:25:26 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Great card for many situations, especially if you play a two-headed giant game, where you start with more life (making the 3 life cost hurt you less), and where you can make your teammate draw 4, yourself draw 4 or each of you draw 2, depending on the situation. Not to mention the card is fine against people who like to make you discard, and it also triggers [River Kelpie](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=River Kelpie) when you flashback it.
posts.html:
Great card for many situations, especially if you play a two-headed giant game, where you start with more life (making the 3 life cost hurt you less), and where you can make your teammate draw 4, yourself draw 4 or each of you draw 2, depending on the situation. Not to mention the card is fine against people who like to make you discard, and it also triggers River Kelpie when you flashback it.
